name: I Will Take Your Death
description:
Controls:

  1. WASD to move
  2. Space Bar to Jump
  3. E to Give Soul
  4. Left Click for Light Attacks
  5. Right Click for Heavy Attacks

God of Death has trapped your soul and is asking for some ransom in order to free back your soul. Give him what he wants!!

made in 16 hours for Mini Jam #72

All the Assets are from itch 2d asset page and are public to use.
